Description: Start date of the mosaicking period
End date of the mosaicking period

Values / format: Variable number of characters which can be freely chosen by a user

Description: Configuration indicator. Identifier for the different pre-defined configurations offered to users.
Processing baseline version. Processing baseline comprise a certain set of software and auxiliary data.
Values / format: The version of the processing system, in the format X.Y.Z
Order number: Arbitrary 3 digits identifier. A unique number assigned for every product
